website_summaries.verdict: Good value for your money. It's hard to find a better performing machine in this price range.
pros: Incredibly affordable for the quality and performance it offers
Provides a generous selection of sewing functions for users of all abilities
cons: Has a difficult time threading through thicker fabric

customer_reviews.title: SINGER SEWING MACHINE DISASTER
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE;!!! SINGER HAS SOLD ITS NAME TO A UNNAMED COMPANY AND IS NO LONGER INVOLVED IN MAKING SEWING MACHINES.. I bought Confidence Quilter Computerized machine, it lasted 3 weeks THEN THE MOTOR BLEW UP. There is now only one place in this area who is authorized to repair Singers. It is two hours distant from my home. I got it repaired, took it home, it worked for another two weeks and the same thing happened. I have owned Singers for all my adult life and they have always been very reliable, not now. Sadly, I hate to see this trusted brand be so diminished.
customer_reviews.author: ELL

customer_reviews.title: Love those Singers!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. I could not afford some of the higher priced quilting machines out there, so I picked one that I could afford that would make my quilting a lot easier and more fun. After sewing on a nearly 40 year old basic Singer this is like driving a cadillac, and I'm pretty happy with it. Just finished my 1st quilt on it and didn't have any problems. I appreciate the support I get in the way of You Tube and other online sources. I think I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Many features and works great
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old Singer machine with this model and I am very happy.The Confidence Quilter has a lot of improvements and new features but they are not overwhelming. The instruction book has large pages with lots of diagrams and an instructional CD is included. I used both to learn some of the features. The one I had difficulty perfecting was the self-threading feature. It required a little more practice. But now I am off and sewing. I think this machine will serve me well for many years. I did buy the warranty packet offered. Although I do not anticipate issues, I am have more confidence with having it should some repair be needed. I thought the price was fair.
customer_reviews.author: DeborahP

customer_reviews.title: User friendly Singer
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to quilting and let me tell you this machine is a delight compared to what I started on! Easy to use and very sturdy. Love it
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Singer Sewing Machine
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this for me and When I first got it ... I thought I Will NEVER use this To many lights etc... BALONEY I LOVE this machine so EASY the designs the way it does JEANS OMG is fantastic!!! silk Just GLIDES thru this machine!!! like "IT KNOWS" dont know what the price was BUT I HAPPY with the machine Thank You Samantha!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a 25+ year old machine that would only do straight stitches. Probably just needed to be serviced but would cost more that it was worth. Got this one and it sews like a dream! Re-found a love of sewing. Now have so many projects lined up.
customer_reviews.author: grandma to Baby Mae

customer_reviews.title: Singer Confidence Quilter
customer_reviews.text: I just love this sewing machine. Bought this machine specifically to make quilts for Christmas gifts for my grandchildren. Have been sewing every day for weeks . For the price its a great bargain. It's easy to use and has all the bells and whistles to make your projects enjoyable. The large table is great. The functions and stitches are ones that you'll use all the time. Being able to purchase this on Amazon prime was an added bonus. Should have gotten this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Evalani

customer_reviews.title: Great, Durable Machine
customer_reviews.text: This has held up over time. Really powerful. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BeautifullyBrainy

customer_reviews.title: The features. Needle position down, optional stitches and walking foot. Hooray!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed making 4 baby quilts with my new machine. Having the ability to have the needle stop in the material and learning how to use the walking foot has made my sewing so much easier!!! I haven't yet mastered the needle threaded but hope to when I find myself with nothing to sew! It's definitely worth the modest price.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie McBrearty

customer_reviews.title: Nice mostly but not overall
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy sewing on this machine but very unhappy with auto needle threader Directions not clear on how to use this feature and when changing a needle it is very much in the way!
customer_reviews.author: M Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: I'm new to quilting and this is the perfect starter machine for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to quilting and this is the perfect starter machine for me. I love the easy-load bobbin and needle threader. The only negative comment I have would be that the machine can be a bit noisy if you're powering through. I made my first queen quilt already and was quite happy with the performance. Love the ease in changing the feet also.
customer_reviews.author: Danetta Vawter

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this machine for the first few weeks, then it suddenly started clanking and stopped working. Now I have to deal with the manufacturer while trying to finish my Christmas sewing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It has a great many decorative stitches and the additional presser feet help start off a new quilter. The automatic bobbin feeder is the greatest thing. It has a needle threader but mine no longer lines up so the thread doesn't get pulled through. I'm sure it was something I did but I can't get it to work again. This machine is good for making crib/lap size quilts but after much more research and a little bit more experience, the throat on the machine is pretty small for making bigger quilts.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Vanmarrum

customer_reviews.title: quilters beware
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a good machine for quilting. Its cheaply made and I can not lower my feed dog because the first time I did it wouldn't go back up. I have found out online that this is a common problem with this machine. I took it apart and figured out how to get it back in the raised position but now it won't lower so that I can free hand sew. I feel like it was a waste of money and I won't buy a Singer again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine to supplement my heavy duty one that I use for making Christmas tree skirts and stockings for my business. I'm still learning to use it but love it! The price was $100 less than the same machine in a sewing/craft store.
customer_reviews.author: Lona Breitkopf

customer_reviews.title: It didn"t come with a manual!
customer_reviews.text: No way to get a Manual just want a paper back manual and only get a download. Go on line and they want a $1.00 to help you. Call and they are out of order. What's wrong with singer. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very easy to start using. I really like all of the decorative stitches and it is so simple to switch from straight stitching to a fancy stitch. The machine runs very smoothly at slow and fast speeds. The bobbin is much easier to insert than other machines I have had. I enjoy making quilts but have not yet done any machine quilting. I do wish that the extension table was much heavier; when I worked on a large piece the extension table tilted (& tilted the machine) when I put too much weight on it with my left arm. For the price this machine is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia in NC

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargin
customer_reviews.text: Received my machine yesterday, I had it up and running and took it for a test drive. Works great. Came with every thing listed. As a novice sewer, it seems easy to use, and user friendly. I do wish there was a light. The is the only draw back. But I am looking forward to many projects and quilts in my future. It's a great machine, and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love,Love......
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great!!!! sewed perfectly straight out of the box. I do agree that the light could be brighter but compared to the brother machine I had been using this is a dream. I'm new to quilting and bought a brand new brother for class in Jan. 2011. I was close to giving up until I got this machine. I really can sew a straight 1/4 inch seam!!!!Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: shops a lot

customer_reviews.title: the automatic tension setting is wonderful. very nice stitches
customer_reviews.text: very quiet, the automatic tension setting is wonderful. very nice stitches. easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H

customer_reviews.title: SINGER 7469Q Confidence Quilter Computerized...
customer_reviews.text: Loving the machine so far - not yet completed a huge project, but lots of features and stitches.
customer_reviews.author: ChancesR

customer_reviews.title: good machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like the machine and am basically happy with it. I was unhappy with the lack of instruction for the added accessories like the walking foot for quilting. I had to search the internet for instructions. This machine replaced a 45 year old Singer that finally gave up. I decided to stick with the Singer and so far so good.I appreciate everyones reviews-they convinced me to buy it. My learning curve has been remarkably quick. I wish the needle threader was removable-it just gets in the way and I can't figure out how to use it. And I agree with other reviews about the light-it's pretty dim. I'm hoping this one lasts me another 45 years!
customer_reviews.author: vanzone

customer_reviews.title: Great pruchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking to replace my old machine of 30 yrs, so I have really been doing my homework and looking into all outlets of where to purchase from. I finally chose this one and found the best price on Amazon. Have used this machine since Christmas and I love it already!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Melonja

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, great price!
customer_reviews.text: The price was well below the price in the local store and this is a fantastic machine for both a beginner or an advanced sewer. I've been teaching my daughter to sew on this machine and It makes teaching easy! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: rjbarr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It's doing all things that it said it could do.
customer_reviews.author: yeabees

customer_reviews.title: Beginner who wants a machine to grow with
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine for the beginner who wants to grow. It works well, never skips a stitch and is easy to thread. It comes with instructional DVD too. I have sewn several projects on it so far and love the quality stitching. It was highly recommended by my sewing instructor as well. She is a big quilter, so I am sure she loves that aspect of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sewing machine for my wife for Christmas. It does everything she wanted it for. She loved it. Super price and really fast delivery. However, now in September(9 months later) I had to bring the machine in for repair. Repairman said if the machine binds up a little it breaks the plastic gear inside and it has to be replaced. This to a tune of $70. Machine not sounding like such a good deal anymore.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good Sewing Machine
customer_reviews.text: If you don't sew over 20 hours a week, then this is a great machine. I love it. I sew more than 20 hours a week now, and I really need to buy a more heavy duty machine. This machine has great features and I have really enjoyed sewing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Trant

customer_reviews.title: Bad machine
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t open the machine until today and the foot pedal does not work This machine cost me close to $300 so im hoping something will be done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Joy!
customer_reviews.text: Got it out of the box, set it up, and have loved every minute I can work with it! There has been nothing to complain about so far! The instruction book is clear and concise. Any questions I may have are easily found. The new quilt I'm working on is FUN to do with this great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Stuteville

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife who's machine was very old and worn out. She loves this machine and would recommend it to anyone. It is very well made and has given no problems whatsoever. She highly recommends it.
customer_reviews.author: Slideone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The computerized quilter & sewing machine combination was just what I needed to award to the adult winner of the National MIWW contest. She was an advanced seamstress and needed a specialized machine.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Lehfeldt

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I had the first one something was wrong and it stopped working, sent it back. Never had another issue with the second one. I love my singers.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sewing Machine
customer_reviews.text: It needed a small adjustment when I first got it because it "knocked" when I used it. It was the arm in the top of the machine that the tread goes through hitting on the casing around it. A simple adjustment with a screwdriver and it was fixed. Otherwise it works nice.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this machine. I was loving it before it broke. I did a couple of small simple baby quilts on it and had fun with all the decorative stitches. I've had it for 1 month and it is broken. It wont sew and is just beeping and flashing the number 88 at me. I called the repair man and he has advised me to return it because the problem is electrical and will be costly. My warranty with Amazon was up 2 days ago and because the nearest Singer service center is 2 hours away, I have chosen to call Singer to ask what they would like me to do...On hold for an hour now...so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: aaronsmom

customer_reviews.title: ... haven't used this machine enough to give a truly good review but I've made a quilt top and hem ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this machine enough to give a truly good review but I've made a quilt top and hem curtains. It has been wonderful! Easy to run and changing the bobbin is a breeze. Love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Anita K Heath-Reddick

customer_reviews.title: Had to return TWICE, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift eagerly expected but soon was very disappointed ....tried two different machines and both didn't run correctly; had to return both of them. I so wanted this machine. The new feature "quilting stitch" did not look like a hand sewn stitch so disappointed. I own 2 Brothers and one Jaonme and never had problems with them. I so wanted this machine because of some of the new features, very bummed the machine didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd sewing machine, so I was scared it would be complicated, it is anything but complicated! Easy to use! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice machine!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great machine and the only reason I did not give it a 5 star was because it is noisier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Let's Go Bucs!!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quilting machine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this quilting machine for my grandmother because she just started a quilting course with a bunch of her friends. My grandma just love it she was so happy when she received and everybody in the class were so jealous. This machine came with 98 stitches that are so useful even I am starting to learn how to sew thanks to this machine! I highly recommend this machine for a beginner or even for an expert! Also the price is great everybody can afford it!
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: And by that, I mean Amazon...NOT Singer. The first Singer I received stopped working just 5 minutes after setup. Turns out the timing was off because there was too much grease put on by the factory. Tried to call Singer, and after 90 minutes of being on hold finally hung up. Amazon, however, replaced the machine within 24 hours and had a UPS man here at my door the next day to pick up the original one. The second machine works like a champ so far.....I am loving it. Will keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Kordell

customer_reviews.title: I think this sewing machine is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine to work on some baby projects. I have made a baby quilt, burp rags, wash clothes and receiving blankets. The machine works wonderfully and I love adding the decorative stitches. I was able to use the machine right out of the box. The price and quick delivery were the reason I chose this sewing machine from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Rasset

customer_reviews.title: new to quilting
customer_reviews.text: I am new to quilting and my old sewing machinewas such a pain to use. When I received this one it was so easy to use. I love it. My only only problem is I find it difficult to free motion quilt. I am sure it is user error and with time it will become easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Singer 7469Q Confidence Quilter Computerized Sewing and Quilting Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! Very easy to use. I love all the different shapes you can do! This is my very first machine and I'm just starting to quilt. This has given me the "Confidence" to keep going!!! I'm going to be making a lot of keep sakes for my children and grandchildren!!! I highly recommend this machine!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Britton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my wife is on her 5th quilt, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tony sims

customer_reviews.title: Liked the way it sewed when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Broken within a few days. Dog feeder would not come up and threaderror arm broke off. Liked the way it sewed when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Neiss

customer_reviews.title: So far it's been very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got mine for Christmas loving it it's my first machine and I am very new to sewing. So far it's been very easy to use. Plan to try free arm quilting soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Singer Confidence Quilter
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Singer Confidence Quilter ... it's exactly what I needed. I've never owned a computerized machine before and it's so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paula B.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, too. Runs smoothly. Saw this same machine in a fabric shop's ad for over twice the price that I paid through Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: NativeIowan

customer_reviews.title: Great thanks!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It works perfect for my quilting and sewing projects. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ren_B

customer_reviews.title: First purchase with Amazon
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase with Amazon was great. I received fast service, and the price could not be beat. I was shopping around for a new sewing machine and could not find one that would fit into my budget. A friend suggested Amazon. I was a little skeptical about buying online from a company that I had not dealt with before. But when I received my new machine days after ordering it, I was thrilled. I was able to get the sewing machine,even delivered to my door, for less than I could find it in stores in my area. I would not hesitate to order again from Amazon. Great product, great price and service.
customer_reviews.author: Sewwhat

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I received my new Singer 7469 last week, went to set up the machine on Sunday did not work. The Display # shows 88 and does not allow me to change. I tried to change the needle from left to center nothing worked. Tried to load the bobbin when using the pressure foot nothing happened. I submitted message to Singer, hoping I hear back from Singer by the end of the day today, if not I will be sending back. I have used nothing by Singer sewing machines my whole life and have always been pleased. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Singer 7469Q Confidence Quilter Computerized Sewing and Quilting Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine so much better than my old one. It is so easy to use. Best purchase I've made in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Clark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and did a great job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and did a great job. As a new machine quilter there is definitely some practice needed to do the free quilting but all in all easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, it has all the features that I was looking for. I read a lot of reviews about this product, some good and some not so good, I decided to take a chance and I am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Holt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The self-threading takes some practice but I'm enjoying the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Burr

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for new beginners
customer_reviews.text: I am just starting to learn to quilt and this machine has been great. We saved over $100 by buying from amazon and it was received at our house in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: cvbcfb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This machine has simple instructions and is a joy to use. I love it,
customer_reviews.author: Iva Jean Wright

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I love the new machine.it's very easy to use.I bought it about 3 weeks ago and i've already pieced a queen sized quilt with it.I love the quilting feet that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: I can not express how much I love, love, love my new sewing machine. It is everything I have wanted in a machine. Also the price was very good. Faith
customer_reviews.author: Faith Bettencourt

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: After just having a basic sewing machine for forty years, how fun to actually have all the neat stitches and all I have to do is enter the number for each stitch!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Caswell

customer_reviews.title: Good machine but...
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a Bernina Artista 2000 & needed quilting foot. It was cheaper to buy this machine that came with a quilting foot than to buy the Vernina foot, or almost. I tried using the Singer & found they have changed to plastic parts & I could not adjust after using a Bernina for 9 years. I am sure the machine is great based on fellow quilters remarks but I decided to return & purchase the quilting foot which actually turned out to be a good move for me. The Bernina foot actually came with 3 different presser feet. Received great customer service for return.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: But I like to take it slow
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I have only had it about a week. Working on getting it threaded. But I like to take it slow. I work full time and don't want to tackle it when I am too tired. I'll let you know more later.
customer_reviews.author: Farley

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: The first one that i received, craped out a mounth later. After winding a bobbin it would not ingauge the needle. Received a replacement & it seems fine
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Not sew good
customer_reviews.text: Bought the machine dec 2012. Have used maybe under 100 times. Motor has stopped working and relay just clicks. The problem could be related to the made in Taiwan sticker, so much for quality. When it did work it worked well, should last longer than it did. Will send for repairs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon junkie

customer_reviews.title: Love the machine
customer_reviews.text: Love the machine. Received my box and opened it and it was a pillow. This took 10 days after ordering it. Not sure about the how the mix up can happened. I left a message and did not speak to anyone. Next day I called and the First Lady I spoke to was rude. I called back and got a second lady who worked hard to straighten theis out. She followed me through to make sure I got the correct item. My machine got to me in two days. Love love the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Manes

customer_reviews.title: Sewing Again!
customer_reviews.text: Threading the needle is not as easy as I thought it would be, but I love the stitch quality and variety!
customer_reviews.author: Pepsima

customer_reviews.title: Froze up!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but it frozen up after sewing less than 15 minutes. Total time used less than 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: JR Rackliff

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This sewing machine is everything I hoped it would be. Easy to use , lots of stitches and other uses. I thought about buying another brand but I am so glad I stuck with Singer.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I received this sewing machine today. I have sewed most of my life and quilted for 21 years, and I love this machine so far. In less than two hours I have tried almost every function, and have understood and mastered just about all. The directions were very clear. The quality of this machine compares to my last machine....a janome. I cannot wait to try the stitches to enhance my quilts! Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Vlwozno

customer_reviews.title: worthless sewing machine.
customer_reviews.text: Has major problems, start it up, makes one stitch, and stops. turn it off for a while, tried again, stuck in reverse, turned off, back on worked fine, turned off, back to the one stitch and off. They would not take it back. I am stuck with a $150.00 piece of worthless junk.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Missing all the accessories
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this machine for me for my birthday. I received it early because I was signed up to take a quilting class. The machine arrived quick thanks to Amazon Prime, but the machine was missing ALL of the accessories that came with the machine, which is a large part of why I chose this machine. So I was unable to practice using any of the special feet at my sewing class. Very disappointed. My husband emailed Singer, and hasn't received a response. I am currently on the phone with their customer service - and there are 16 customers ahead of me! While the machine seems to sew nicely, be wary of buying on-line.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the better gifts I have given my wife
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! Simple to set up, and I was sewing right away.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Singer Confidence Quilter 7469Q Sewing Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sewing machine. I am a novice quilter and it just works so smoothly. Easy to begin any sewing project. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA MEYERS

customer_reviews.title: Singer 7469Q
customer_reviews.text: I purchase my sewing machine 7469Q a couple of months ago I have not encounter any problem as of yet. It runs smooth as I expected it.
customer_reviews.author: Mars fr. San Antonio, TX

customer_reviews.title: Timing problems GALORE.
customer_reviews.text: I actually hate this machine now. I worked fine for few months, then the timing issues started. I have already had to take it in for repair for the timing issue. I just stared sewing again with it and the same exact problem happened. I'm so frustrated with this machine, and I just don't want to pay another $60 for repair when I just paid to get this fixed a month ago. Worst machine ever. I can't sew anything with any thickness to it as it throws the timing off. Hate hate hate this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Spell

customer_reviews.title: Singer Confidence Sewing Machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Singer Confidence Quilting Machine about a month ago. I am a beginner quilter and not had enough time to use it as I would like. It has all the options that I wanted. I paid half the price that JOANN FABRICS was asking, no taxes and no shipping fee!! What a deal!!! It arrived in less than 5 days! I would advise everyone to check Amazon out before making any purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful and the shipping time was exact and in wonderful ...
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful and the shipping time was exact and in wonderful shipping condition. I would recommend this to anyone who loves quilting and sewing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing about this machine is the peddle sticks, other than that it's very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just what I was looking for in an update for my old machine
customer_reviews.author: scissortail Mom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Did not finish my first project and the machine has failed. Cannot get through to Singer because of the long wait and have yet to receive an email response. I don't know what to rate this machine. That will depend on how Singer handles my dilemma.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet. It seemed to have alot of features and was heavy duty and durable with a long warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The machine had no plug to hook the foot cord ...
customer_reviews.text: The machine had no plug to hook the foot cord. It was cheaper to get it fixed than to ship it back. Will not be buying here again.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Sledge

customer_reviews.title: anderson
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. I have really enjoyed using it. I "try" to quilt and this has been fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We had an issue with a missing part but Premiere Appliance did a great job handling the issue. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: mrbrad07

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This machine lasted about 14 months...I used it often, but I took excellent care of it and treated it gently. Thread often got caught up inside the machine, and I had to take it apart to untangle it. The tension was never exactly right, and finally, the bobbin case simply fell apart. I tried replacing it, but couldn't find one that fit. I received this machine as a gift, and frankly, I cannot say I liked it enough to spend money to have it repaired. Basically, it's now a bobbin winder, and I have scarfed up all the extra feet it came with for use with my other machines.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette G.

customer_reviews.title: It gets me by bus it's not a good machine.
customer_reviews.text: I got a previously returned machine. It came with the complaint from the previous owner still in the box. Her complaint was not fixed before sending out to me again. In short, the stitch length is wonky. If I turn it all the way down and then back to where I want it, it works fine. But as soon as I turn the machine off I have to do the same thing again when I turn the machine on again. It's annoying. I've also found it doesn't work great going through several layers of fabric, something that is important with quilting. I would not buy this machine or recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yeah! A machine that works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine so far! My old one was garbage and I'd been looking at this one for a while. I has a lot of great features, like the clear bobbin cover, and the easy threading. I especially like the auto tension, which bypasses a lot of the issues I had with my old machine. I've only sewn a couple of things on it so far, but now that I have a machine that really performs well, I hope to do more. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NJC

customer_reviews.title: Junk,stay away
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace this twice,this time it's out of warrantee and in the garbage. So so disappointed being Singer and is all plastic and junk. Feed dogs stopped working and BOBBINS don't wind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Have had machine for about 6 weeks and have used it mainly for quilting. Really like features if machine. It came with a 1/4 inch and walking foot. Those have been extremely helpful. Have used some of the speciality stitches to mend some stretch knits which worked wonderfully. Changing feet and needles is a breeze. Only issue I've had is with the automatic needle threader. It's not all that automatic and I've only got it to thread on the first time, once. I'll keep practicing
customer_reviews.author: IrishMom52

customer_reviews.title: Great machine! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This a very nice machine and very easy to set up and start sewing even for a beginner like me :) I’ve already made 2 quilted throws and 3 lap quilts. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Pigmom

customer_reviews.title: works great, has stiches I had not expected to find ...
customer_reviews.text: Has features of much more expensive machines, works great, has stiches I had not expected to find on this machine but will be very useful when quilting
customer_reviews.author: squidly

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this sewing machine. Easy to use. I cannot say enough about how much I like it. You cannot go wrong if you are a beginner to sewing. I'm not, but I'm not advanced either. This is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Duprey

customer_reviews.title: Singer Confidence Quilter
customer_reviews.text: This SINGER 7469Q Confidence Quilter Computerized Sewing and Quilting Machine is a good starter free motion sewing machine. It has everything, but the throat is small, and the machine has problems going over doubled seams. I have already made my first quilt, a queen-size quilt, and was able to quilt it without too many problems. It didn't take me too long to figure out how to operate the machine; it is quite simple and I love the built in stitches. I recommend this machine as a starter machine to beginner sewers and quilters. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Worthy investment
customer_reviews.text: I adore this machine. Have had it for over a year now and no complaints. I had to get the first one I received replaced because of a small problem but zero problems since then.
customer_reviews.author: Team Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 41 year old Kenmore machine with the Singer 7469Q. This machine does everything I need it to do. Sewing is fun again. The stitch options are at my fingertips. I still rely on the instruction booklet to steer me thru some of the things that I'm not sure of..like buttonholes and applique stitches. Love the free arm for sewing on small items such as sleeves and hemming jeans. The only thing I would change is the foot pedal. It is so light I tend to kick it around and have to look for it under the table! This is a great little machine and I would definatley recommend this machine to my friends & family.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Value and options
customer_reviews.text: Great price . I use this for all types of sewing, mostly for Mali g quilts and it can do it all! So many options for the price! Nothing like a Singet!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rathfelder

customer_reviews.title: So much better than moms old machines
customer_reviews.text: My wife is thrilled how much more this machine does than most. She says it is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: physicist3

customer_reviews.title: Love this sewing machine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sewing machine. It is easy to use and sews like a dream. I use it for machine quilting and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thompson

product_meta.title: SINGER | Confidence 7469Q Computerized & Quilting Sewing Machine with Built-In Needle Threader, 98 Built-In Stitches - Sewing Made Easy
product_meta.description: The Singer 7469Q Confidence Quilter portable sewing machine is the perfect machine for new and skilled quilters alike. With many advanced features, your sewing will be relaxing and creative. The programmable needle up/down feature is vital for quilters when piecing together patchworks. Select to have the needle stop in the down position when appliquéing, quilting or pivoting fabric. The machine comes with four bonus quilting feet to expand your creative quilting and sewing possibilities. Use the darning and embroidery foot for stippling, the even feed/walking foot for even flow of fabric, the open toe foot for better visibility and the 1/4-inch foot for piecing together quilt blocks. The large sewing surface lets you manage large quilts and other sewing projects with ease.
feature_bullets: Automatic needle threader and Drop & Sew bobbin system make for quick and easy set-up. Helpful Hint: To secure thread, pull both threads to the backside of the fabric and tie together.
98 built-in stitches with seven fully automatic one-step buttonholes provide endless project possibilities
Programmable needle up/down and drop feed make quilting fun and easy
Four bonus quilting feet and an extension table create the winning quilting combination
Electronic twin needle control and adjustable stitch length and width allow you to customize your projects. 110 volt sewing machine designed for United States and Canadian use only. . Amps: 0. 62
This sewing machine is warranted for use in the US and Canada at 110 volts only.
